website_summaries.verdict: A light, moisturizing formula that goes on smooth and tightens skin to keep you looking your best.
pros: Reduces the appearance of wrinkles by hydrating skin

website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its weightless, watery texture that goes on seamlessly and doesn't feel oily.
pros: Excellent for super dry and sensitive skin types
Great for when you need a boost of hydration while you're getting ready in the morning or before bed
Heals cracked or chapped skin and soothes irritation
cons: Some customers say it works best when paired with another moisturizing cream or lotion

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper on O.co
customer_reviews.text: Love this product hate the amazon price. It’s available on overstock.com 4 ounces for 51 including tax. Thought y’all should know!
customer_reviews.author: Max Power

customer_reviews.title: Great product; horrible current price
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years and the product is great; but not the current price. At $64 - almost double what it goes for elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Murphy

customer_reviews.title: The Fragrance is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! I purchased the Image Skincare Vital Hydrating Anti-Aging Serum - 1.7 oz on February 10, 2018 for $13.37, yes a great deal. However, today Amazon is selling it for $64.00!!. I previously purchased just about everything from Amazon - no more. Recently, they are much more expensive than I can find online elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: ParisLove

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product---smells great
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product---smells great, is light and feels good, hydrates very well. Have been using it for a long time now. Just don't understand why the price has jumped so much in the last few months. If this continues, I will have to find another option, and I really don't want to.
customer_reviews.author: DianaP

customer_reviews.title: Image skincare vital C anti-aging serum.
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered promptly as promised. The serum is creamy and rich and has a wonderful citrus scent. I use it with Image pure hyaluronic acid filler and feel that it has helped smooth out my skin. I prefer this serum to the A,C,E serum. I am over 60.
customer_reviews.author: Dufferino

customer_reviews.title: Great smell - I love to put this on my face
customer_reviews.text: I love the orange smell and the feel of this skin serum. It's not meant to be a total skin lotion, so I follow with a richer creme. The dispenser works well to pump out small amounts. At the bottom of the bottle, you can unscrew the cap and add a little water to get the remaining lotion. Does it take away all my wrinkles and plump out my skin? Not that I can tell, but I'd have to say this about any skin care products that I've tried. The only negative is that it's fairly expensive, although Amazon had a distributor that had a better than usual price this time.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Product smells great but effects are blah
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this now four times and been using for 6 months. I think the smell is lovely, especially if you love citrus. However, I the cons outweigh the pros. I run out of the product every month in a half. The pump always seems to break and I feel like the serum does not come out and a lot is wasted. And as far as seeing results, I have seen nothing in the past six months since starting. I like other products much better for vitamin c purposes.
customer_reviews.author: McZack

customer_reviews.title: Great for all skin types!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I originally purchased it from a spa 4 years ago and continue to use it daily. Very light, yet hydrates all day and the vitamin c smells amazing! The ONLY reason I gave it 4 stars was because of the price increase! I wish they would keep it affordable or I will be forced to find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: I cannot say enough about this product! It is ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this product! It is a miracle in a bottle! Ladies, put on your arms and hands for those brown spots and watch them go! I am 64, so I know!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Great sent~ minimal results
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed about the product was the incredible citrus sent. This usually makes me weary of a product if the scent is strong=chemicals. It feels great going on but the moisturing effect does not last long. There is a tightening feeling to the skin after the moisture wears off in a few minutes leaving the skin feeling smooth. I like the pump applicator, easy to dispense. In comparison to other similar medical grade products, I would spent a bit more for a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Defective pump
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but I am very frustrated because the pump stopped working after using only for 1 week. When I tried to open the container to fix it the top broke and I spilled a lot of the product, I am going to have to throw most of it away since I am traveling. Expensive mistake!
customer_reviews.author: sue k schultz

customer_reviews.title: Pump not working
customer_reviews.text: The product is good but the container is not. It's not working and it costs a lot, so I don't know how I will use it because the pump is not working anymore after 5 days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ilmera

customer_reviews.title: Does not compare to other vitamin C serums
customer_reviews.text: I started using vitamin C serums about a year ago and am hooked on Sunday Riley CEO. But it's really expensive. I researched the ingredients and found that the Image Skincare Vital C was a close match to the Sunday Riley. I used the whole bottle but found it irritated my skin a bit and did not give me the results I was looking for. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Flowerbomb

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible pump container!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and love it. It has recently jumped about $20.00 though! I hope they change the pump container to something more economic, simpler, and foolproof. A significant portion of the product seems to be consistently wasted with this poor, frequently faulty system. If it costs more I hope to at least use most of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it at this price anymore :(
customer_reviews.text: I been using this for years and it is good for my skin but not worth the price anymore. This is too much for the amount of product you get. The first time I bought it, it was around $40 which was a reasonable Overstock definitely have the best prices on all image skincare. Shipping is a bit slow. Wish Amazon offer better prices.
customer_reviews.author: Hin

customer_reviews.title: This product is usually great however the one I just received doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product is usually great however the one I just received doesn’t work. Even when taking the top off hardly anything comes out. Very disappointing I’d give no stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Nice price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, Nice price. Now not so chaep anymore, otherwise I ordered again. Can anybody tell me why the prizes increased triple???

customer_reviews.title: Good serum
customer_reviews.text: Love this serum an old favourite but the price keeps going up not sure I be faithfully buying if the price goes up too much

customer_reviews.title: AVOID!
customer_reviews.text: FAKE. I have purchased and loved this product for years. This is a cheap knock off. The bottle did not dunction properly and ran out quickly. AVOID!!

customer_reviews.title: I love it!

customer_reviews.title: ... this for a few years and I do feel like it helps
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few years and I do feel like it helps. My skin is addicted to the soft texture it provides and I love the fresh yet not over-powering orange scent. It soaks right in with no sticky feel and is perfect under make-up. Use it morning and night.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey J. Matusek

customer_reviews.title: I really see the difference!
customer_reviews.text: I switched from Mary Kay to this skin care line and happy to say I did. Immediately this product eliminated any redness from my face. I use the sunblock 30 moisturizer by Image Skincare after I apply this serum. Works great!

customer_reviews.title: Great product with  lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: Love the way my skin feels with this serum. I use the entire line, and it makes my skin feel fresh without drying it out. The scent is light, a fragrant orange which is pleasing. Found this originally at a spa and bought it on Amazon for the convenience. #amazingproduct
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite skincare lines. Products are paraben free and this is a lightweight moisturizing product I've used for years. Smells great, quick absorbing and will last quite awhile.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product... I've used it for several years and highly recommend...you do not need to use much each time, so it lasts for 7-8 months...

customer_reviews.title: I had run out of this product a few months ...

customer_reviews.title: Perspective from someone with dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this consistently for a few months now. I love the smell (it reminds me of a Dreamsicle!), but when used as directed it clogs my pores, and leaves a sticky residue on my face that I haven’t felt with other serums. I’ve found I don’t have this issue if I use it the day of an exfoliation, so I’ve limited my application of this to twice a week, tops. Honestly this would be more of an add-on product for me rather than part of my daily routine, and the price would have to reflect that for me to consider purchasing it again.

product_meta.title: Image skincare Vital C Hydrating Anti Aging Serum, 1.7 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
This comforting serum works on all skin types to soften the appearance of wrinkles, support collagen, and defend against environmental damage. Algae extract helps to firm the skin while hyaluronic acid provides an intense plumping effect. An ultra-effective form of vitamin C brightens, tightens and fights the visible signs of stress and fatigue that commonly appear in aging skin. Its potent antioxidant blend helps to promote a healthy skin balance and enhance the skin’s luminosity. Suitable for all skin types, including dry, dehydrated, sun-damaged, sensitive or acne-prone skin. Can be used on dry acne conditions

BRAND STORY
IMAGE Skincare is a clean and professional line backed by clinical results. Created by an esthetician, formulated by Dr. Marc Ronert, a plastic surgeon, and represented by a network of 20,000 skincare professionals.
